1.label: Travel to Airport
1.notes: Travel from home to Toronto Pearson International Airport (YYZ). Allow 1 hour for travel time to ensure arrival with sufficient buffer.

1.label: Airport Arrival & Security
1.notes: Arrive at YYZ Terminal 3. Allow 2 hours for security screening, check-in procedures, and boarding preparation before the 22:10 departure.

1.label: Flight WS 34: YYZ to DUB
1.notes: WESTJET Flight WS 34. Economy Class, Seat 25C. Duration: 6h 50m. Departure: 22:10 from YYZ Terminal 3. Arrival: 10:00 next day at DUB Terminal 1. Distance: 3,279 miles. Note: Flight duration is 6h 50m but shows local time span from departure to arrival.

2.label: Arrive DUB - Customs & Immigration
2.notes: Arrival at Dublin Airport Terminal 1. Clear customs and immigration. Collect luggage.

2.label: Pick up Rental Car
2.notes: Pick up Toyota Auris (manual transmission) from Budget at Dublin Airport. Confirmation: 30188241CA6. Bring valid driver's license and passport. Unlimited kilometers. Drop off: Galway Downtown on Sep 04 at 12:00 PM.

2.label: Check-in at Wicklow Town Accommodation
2.notes: Check-in at 3-bedroom family home with sea and mountain view in Wicklow Town. Host: Gianpaolo. Check-in after 3:00 PM. Pets allowed, quiet hours 9:00 PM - 9:00 AM.

4.label: Return Rental Car
4.notes: Return Toyota Auris to Budget at Galway Downtown location (12 Eyre Square). Return by 12:00 PM. Ensure car is clean and personal items are removed.

14.label: Flight FR1182: SNN to LGW
14.notes: Ryanair Flight FR1182 from Shannon (SNN) to London Gatwick (LGW). Departure: 11:20 AM, Arrival: 12:55 PM. Passengers: Mr KANTHAVEL VIVEKANANDA (30C) and Ms DENISE CONNOLLY (30D). Reservation: MRZMHC. Checked bags: 20kg + 23kg each, Priority boarding, 2 cabin bags each. Total: 235.42 EUR.

19.label: Check-in at Hampstead Flat
19.notes: Check-in at modern spacious 1-bedroom flat in Hampstead, Greater London. Host: Alireza. Check-in after 4:00 PM. 2 adults, no pets, quiet hours 10:00 PM - 8:00 AM. Payment: $106.28 CAD via Amex 1007.

20.label: Checkout from Hampstead Flat
20.notes: Checkout from Hampstead flat by 10:00 AM. Ensure flat is clean and personal items are removed.

20.label: Flight W9 5735: LGW to FAO
20.notes: Wizz Air Flight W9 5735 from London Gatwick Airport (South Terminal) to Faro (FAO). Departure: 15:40, Arrival: 18:40. Passengers: Mr Kanthavel Vivekananda and Ms Denise Connolly. Confirmation: TJ4SPS. Cabin baggage: 1/40x30x20cm each, Checked bag: 1/20kg each. Total: 333.98 GBP. Check-in opens 48 hours before departure.

24.label: Airport Arrival & Check-in (Faro - FAO)
24.notes: Arrive at Faro Airport for Azores Airlines check-in. Last check-in listed 12:25; plan to arrive with time for bag drop and security. Bring photo ID at check-in as required (Booking Reference: Y3KZLD Office).

24.label: Flight S40199: FAO to PDL (Faro → Ponta Delgada)
24.notes: AZORES AIRLINES Flight S40199. Departure: 13:25, Arrival: 15:05. Class: V. Seat: 22D. Baggage: 1PC (each piece up to 32 kg; additional fees apply for 23–32 kg). Passenger: Connolly Denise Mrs (ADT). Ticket: 331 2405955167. Booking Ref: Y3KZLD Office. Contact (SATA AZORES AIRLINES): PORTUGAL: +351 296209720, USA: +1-800-762-9995 / +1-508-677-0555, CANADA: +1 416-515-7188. At check-in you must show a photo ID.

25.label: Drive: Ponta Delgada → Lagoa do Canário car park
25.notes: Approx. 25 min (≈18 km). Park at the free gravel lot signed “Lagoa do Canário / Miradouro da Boca do Inferno.” Start early to avoid the lot filling after 10:00.

25.label: Boca do Inferno viewpoint & short ridge trail
25.notes: Short easy ridge trail from the car park (10–15 min to the viewpoint). No facilities — bring water and sun protection. Option to extend the ridge path if desired.

25.label: Lagoa do Canário (snapchat-shaped lake)
25.notes: Small signed forest path from the parking area. Quiet early in the morning — good for photos.

25.label: Vista do Rei viewpoint
25.notes: Classic twin-lake panorama. Large paved parking next to the abandoned Monte Palace Hotel (free).

25.label: Lagoa de Santiago viewpoint
25.notes: Quick roadside pull-off (space for 4–5 cars). Short stop to view crater lake encircled by forest.

25.label: Explore Sete Cidades village & lakeshore
25.notes: Includes driving down into the crater (≈15 min). Parking free along village streets or small lakeside lots. Activities: kayak/paddleboard rental (~€10/hr), lakeside cycling, or walking the shore.

25.label: Lunch in Sete Cidades
25.notes: Options: Green Love (smoothies, bowls) or Restaurante Lagoa Azul (hearty Azorean meals). Or picnic by the lake with supplies picked up earlier.

25.label: Drive: Sete Cidades → Ponta da Ferraria
25.notes: Coastal scenic drive approx. 30 min. Parking at the paved lot by “Termas da Ferraria.”

25.label: Swim at Ponta da Ferraria (natural thermal ocean pools)
25.notes: Warm ocean water heated by volcanic vents. Temperatures vary with tide — check tide table; mid/ high tide usually 28–32°C, low tide may have localized >40°C spots. Use ropes/ladders for safety and follow lifeguard guidance. Indoor spa facilities available (booking recommended).

25.label: Ponta do Escalvado viewpoint
25.notes: Short drive (5–10 min). Roadside pull-off with cliff-top views west across Mosteiros islets and coastline — great photo stop.

25.label: Drive: Ponta do Escalvado → Mosteiros
25.notes: Approx. 15 min drive along the coast to Mosteiros.

25.label: Relax at Mosteiros (Praia dos Mosteiros / tidepools) & sunset
25.notes: Enjoy black sand beach, rocky tidepools, and basalt sea stacks during golden hour. Dining options: Brisa do Mar (seafood) or Sunset Stefano’s Café (drinks/snacks). If preferred, return to Ponta Delgada afterwards for dinner (≈40 min drive).

25.label: Drive back to Ponta Delgada
25.notes: Approx. 40 min drive back to Ponta Delgada. Evening dinner options in town: A Tasca, Taberna Açor (book ahead if busy).

26.label: Drive: Ponta Delgada → Furnas
26.notes: Approx. 50 min drive to Furnas Valley. Start early to make the most of the morning light.

26.label: Miradouro do Pico do Ferro (caldera & lake viewpoint)
26.notes: Free paved lot. Classic caldera and Furnas Lake panorama — quick stop for photos and views.

26.label: Mata Jardim José do Canto & Salto do Rosal (garden + waterfall trail)
26.notes: Park at Jardim da Lagoa das Furnas lot (small fee ≈€2–3). Stroll through landscaped gardens and take the ~15 min trail to Salto do Rosal waterfall.

26.label: Drive: Furnas → Maia
26.notes: Approx. 35–40 min coastal drive to Maia.

26.label: Praia da Viola Coastal Walk
26.notes: Easy 1.2 mi round-trip coastal walk with cliffs, watermills, and beach. Small free roadside parking near Maia.

26.label: Lunch in Maia
26.notes: Options: Restaurante Praia da Viola (seafood, terrace) or snack-bar O Moinho (casual). Booking usually not required.

26.label: Drive: Maia → Ribeira dos Caldeirões
26.notes: Approx. 25–30 min drive to the Ribeira dos Caldeirões park area.

26.label: Ribeira dos Caldeirões (waterfall & watermills trail)
26.notes: 20–30 min walk through lush park with waterfall and historic watermills. Free parking at the entrance.

26.label: Ponta do Sossego viewpoint & gardens
26.notes: Manicured cliffside gardens with excellent ocean views — good short stop for photos.

26.label: Ponta da Madrugada viewpoint (optional)
26.notes: Optional extra viewpoint ~10 min further east. Include only if running on schedule.

26.label: Drive: Nordeste → Furnas
26.notes: Approx. 40–45 min drive back toward Furnas for evening hot springs.

26.label: Poça da Dona Beija hot springs (soak)
26.notes: Relaxed soak in several warm pools (≈33–38 °C). Typical entry ≈€8–10. Lockers and showers available. Time here may feel short if busy; adjust as needed.

26.label: Light dinner / snack in Furnas
26.notes: Options: Caldeiras & Vulcões (traditional) or Cantinho do Cais (homestyle). Option to skip and return to Ponta Delgada for dinner.

26.label: Drive back to Ponta Delgada
26.notes: Approx. 50 min drive back to Ponta Delgada. Adjust departure if running behind schedule from earlier stops.

27.label: Drive: Ponta Delgada/Água de Alto → Lagoa do Fogo viewpoint
27.notes: Depart early for Lagoa do Fogo viewpoint. From Água de Alto ≈25 min; from Ponta Delgada allow up to ~45 min depending on route and traffic. Parking: free pull-offs at Miradouro da Lagoa do Fogo or Miradouro da Barrosa.

27.label: Explore Lagoa do Fogo
27.notes: Walk viewpoints and optional short descent to the lake (~15–20 min down). Best light and visibility early; clouds often roll in later. Bring water and a light jacket.

27.label: Coffee / Snack stop (Ribeira Grande or en route)
27.notes: Stop for coffee and pastries at a pastelaria in Ribeira Grande or another café en route south; good second breakfast before kayaking.

27.label: Early lunch in Vila Franca do Campo
27.notes: Light lunch recommended. Options: Bar Caloura (seaside seafood, ~15 min east) or marina restaurants in Vila Franca. Keep it light for the kayak tour.

27.label: Check-in at Vila Franca marina (kayak tour)
27.notes: Arrive to check in and park. Paid marina parking (€2–3). Bring swimsuits, towel, sunscreen, water, and any personal snorkel gear. Tour operators typically require check-in ~15–30 min before departure.

27.label: Kayak guided tour: Vila Franca islet (paddle + swim/snorkel)
27.notes: 3-hour guided kayak tour around the islet including swimming/snorkeling inside the crater lagoon. Guided, includes gear and basic safety briefing. Expect to return to the marina around 17:00.

27.label: Quick snack (optional) in Vila Franca
27.notes: Grab pastries, fruit, or a light snack in Vila Franca to tide you over before evening activities (optional).

28.label: Airport Arrival & Check-in (Ponta Delgada - PDL)
28.notes: Arrive at Ponta Delgada (João Paulo II) Airport before last check-in (08:00) for Azores Airlines departure. Bring photo ID and ticket information (Passenger: Connolly Denise Mrs, Ticket: 331 2405955167, Booking Ref: Y3KZLD Office).

28.label: Flight S40198: PDL to FAO (Ponta Delgada → Faro)
28.notes: AZORES AIRLINES Flight S40198. Departure: 09:00, Arrival: 12:25. Class: V. Baggage: 1PC. Passenger: Connolly Denise Mrs (ADT). Ticket: 331 2405955167. Fare Basis: VRBSC. Booking Ref: Y3KZLD Office. Contact (SATA AZORES AIRLINES): PORTUGAL: +351 296209720, USA: +1-800-762-9995 / +1-508-677-0555, CANADA: +1 416-515-7188. At check-in you must show a photo ID.

273.label: Flight W9 5732: FAO to LGW
273.notes: Wizz Air Flight W9 5732 from Faro (FAO) to London Gatwick Airport (South Terminal). Departure: 11:25, Arrival: 14:20. Passengers: Mr Kanthavel Vivekananda and Ms Denise Connolly. Confirmation: TJ4SPS. Cabin baggage: 1/40x30x20cm each, Checked bag: 1/20kg each. Total: 333.98 GBP. Check-in opens 48 hours before departure.

277.label: Flight MH3: LHR to KUL
277.notes: Malaysia Airlines Flight MH3 from London Heathrow Terminal 4 to Kuala Lumpur Terminal 1. Departure: 11:00 AM, Arrival: 07:15 AM next day. Passenger: Ms Denise Marie Connolly. Booking: F33IVQ, Ticket: 232-2480176351. Economy Class, 35kg baggage allowance. Check-in closes 60 min before departure, gates close 30 min before departure.

278.label: Check-in at Coogee Beachside Sanctuary
278.notes: Check-in at Italian-inspired beachside sanctuary in Coogee. Address: 84 Beach St, Coogee NSW 2034, Australia. Host: Charlotte. Check-in after 2:00 PM. 2 adults, no pets, quiet hours 10:00 PM - 7:00 AM. Not suitable for children. Payment: $5,741.39 CAD via Amex 1007 (includes $551.10 service fees).

306.label: Checkout from Coogee Beachside Sanctuary
306.notes: Checkout from Coogee beachside sanctuary by 11:00 AM. Ensure property is clean and personal items are removed.
